info.name: Azure AI Foundry SO (Structured Output)
info.description: Postman collection for testing Azure AI Foundry SO API with structured output. This collection includes RESTful endpoints for managing agents and threads (conversations) with book recommendations. The API returns structured output in BookRecommendationAgentResponse format.

item.name: Agents

request.description: Creates a new BookRecommendationAgent. This endpoint always creates a BookRecommendationAgent that returns structured book recommendations. No request body is required. The response will include the agentId.

item.description: Endpoint for creating BookRecommendationAgent. POST /api/agents creates a new BookRecommendationAgent that returns structured book recommendations. No request body required.

item.name: Threads
Create Thread and Get Book Recommendations

request.description:
Creates a new conversation (thread) for a BookRecommendationAgent and sends the first message. The response will include structured book recommendations in BookRecommendationAgentResponse format.

Request body:
- agentId (required): The ID of the BookRecommendationAgent to use
- message (required): The message requesting book recommendations

Example messages:
- "Recommend me some science fiction books"
- "I'm looking for mystery novels with strong female protagonists"
- "What are the best fantasy books published in 2023?"

request.description:
Adds a message to an existing conversation (thread) with a BookRecommendationAgent. Use this endpoint when you have both agentId and threadId to continue an existing conversation. The conversation context will be maintained, and you'll receive structured book recommendations in the response.

Request body:
- agentId (required): The ID of the BookRecommendationAgent to use
- message (required): The follow-up message

Path parameter:
- threadId (required): The ID of the existing thread/conversation

response.name: Success Response with Follow-up Recommendations

request.description: Example request for mystery books with specific criteria. This demonstrates how to request book recommendations with specific requirements.
Example request for recent fantasy books. This shows how to request books by genre and publication year.

item.description: Endpoints for managing threads (conversations) and messages with structured book recommendations. POST /api/threads creates a new thread and sends the first message (agentId in body). POST /api/threads/{threadId}/messages adds a message to an existing thread (agentId in body). All responses return BookRecommendationAgentResponse with structured book recommendations in the messages.

variable.description: Base URL for the API. Default is http://localhost:5297 (matches launchSettings.json)
Agent ID for testing agent operations. Get this from the Create Agent endpoint response.
Thread ID (conversation ID) for testing conversation operations. Get this from the Create Thread endpoint response.
